mapper.select: SELECT UR.id as reservation_id, UR.*, CTY.class_type_name, CTY.class_name, CP.class_point_name, II.instructor_name, CT.class_start_time, CT.class_end_time, CI.class_date FROM user_reservation AS UR INNER JOIN post.class_info AS CI ON UR.class_id = CI.id INNER JOIN post.class_type AS CTY ON CI.class_type_id = CTY.id INNER JOIN post.class_point AS CP ON CI.class_point_id = CP.id INNER JOIN post.class_time AS CT ON CI.class_time_id = CT.id INNER JOIN post.instructor_info AS II ON CI.instructor_id = II.id WHERE UR.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY UR.create_dt desc, CI.class_date desc, CT.class_start_time LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT 1 from user_reservation WHERE user_id = #{user_id} LIMIT 1 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT UR.id as reservation_id, UR.user_id as user_id, UR.class_id as class_id, CTY.class_type_name, CTY.class_name, CP.class_point_name, II.instructor_name, CT.class_start_time, CT.class_end_time, CI.class_date FROM user_reservation AS UR INNER JOIN post.class_info AS CI ON UR.class_id = CI.id INNER JOIN post.class_type AS CTY ON CI.class_type_id = CTY.id INNER JOIN post.class_point AS CP ON CI.class_point_id = CP.id INNER JOIN post.class_time AS CT ON CI.class_time_id = CT.id INNER JOIN post.instructor_info AS II ON CI.instructor_id = II.id WHERE UR.user_id = #{userId} and UR.cancel_flag = 0 ORDER BY CI.class_date desc, CT.class_start_time desc LIMIT 3

SELECT UR.*, US.email, US.name, UR.user_id as user_id, CTY.class_type_name, CTY.class_name, CP.class_point_name, II.instructor_name, CT.class_start_time, CT.class_end_time, CI.class_date, CI.id as class_id FROM user_reservation AS UR INNER JOIN post.class_info AS CI ON UR.class_id = CI.id INNER JOIN post.class_type AS CTY ON CI.class_type_id = CTY.id INNER JOIN post.class_point AS CP ON CI.class_point_id = CP.id INNER JOIN post.class_time AS CT ON CI.class_time_id = CT.id INNER JOIN post.instructor_info AS II ON CI.instructor_id = II.id INNER JOIN post.user AS US ON UR.user_id = US.id WHERE UR.id = #{reservation_id}
